title: Malignant neoplasm: Overlapping lesion of bone and articular cartilage
block: Malignant neoplasms of bone and articular cartilage
category: Malignant neoplasm of bone and articular cartilage of other and unspecified sites
inclusion: Malignant neoplasm of bone and articular cartilage whose point of origin cannot be classified to any one of the categories C40-C41.4
